    <span style="font-size: 14px;">Show LaTeX Code</span>
    </br>

    <div id="{{id}}_hidden" style="display: none;">
      <button class="btn btn-success btn-sm" onclick="selectText('{{id}}_code')">

      </button>
      </br>
      </br>
      <pre id="{{id}}_code">{{latexTable}}</pre>
